attributes.action: Give 100% of the "£350 million per week" EU fee to the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson's campaign poster: http://i.imgur.com/UqIXg65.png

Nigal Farage misleading the public into thinking all of the money might go to the NHS:  http://www.newstatesman.com/politics/uk/2016/06/jeremy-corbyn-vows-not-resign-what-next-labour

Even if these two (out of many) weren't in a position to make that call, the leave voters were still very much mislead by the Brexit campaigners themselves. As such, we the people ask for this money to go to the NHS as a token gesture, if nothing else
attributes.background: The British public was mislead by Boris Johnson and others into believing the entirety of the £350 per week EU fee would go directly to the NHS. As a token gesture, and to make amends for their lies, give that money to the NHS and restore our faith in democracy.
